**Excerpt from site:** A list of the biggest machine learning datasets from across the web

1.  Link to list of datasets here: <https://www.datasetlist.com/>

![](featured.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of a webpage listing machine learning datasets, last updated in December 2021. The page allows users to subscribe for updates and filter datasets by categories such as image, NLP, self-driving, question answering, and audio. Visible dataset entries include the Mapillary Metropolis Dataset, Google Open Buildings, Matterport Habitat, Unsplash Dataset, BuildingNet, and Apple Hypersim Dataset. Each entry displays the name, year, a short description, license type (e.g., \"Non-commercial\", \"CC BY 4.0\", \"Various\"), and a link to the associated paper."}
